So I've seen this bug a bunch of times on YouTube etc. So I didn't think it was worth another report. However in my case it was kind of hilarious so I'll post it as a story instead. 

I had built a pretty stupid craft, just a pod stacked on multiple boosters. It was never coming back to Kerbin, at least not without a second mission.  I launched straight up and ended up with a very short but very high orbit, then I staged and fired the second boster, which sent me on a trajectory out of the Kerbin system. 

Just before I exited Kerbin's sphere of influence I switched to craft view, and as I transitioned to Kerbol's influence this happened...

And after seeing that I couldn't help think of this scene from the movie Interstellar :
